fact_check_explanation_title: Why it’s unlikely Geronimo the alpaca’s TB test gave a false positive
fact_check_explanation_summary: Bovine TB tests work by detecting an antibody response. But that antibody response isn’t triggered unless the animal has been infected in the past.

fact_check_explanation_title: The Pfizer vaccine, teenagers and myocarditis
fact_check_explanation_summary: There were just under 400 reported cases of myocarditis, none of them fatal, after 8.9 million teens were vaccinated in the US.

fact_check_explanation_title: What extra expenses can MPs claim if they have children?
fact_check_explanation_summary: MPs claiming for rental accommodation costs can claim an extra £5,500 per dependant.

fact_check_explanation_title: Headlines exaggerate danger of hydrogen boilers
fact_check_explanation_summary: Claims that hydrogen boilers could explode at quadruple the rate of conventional gas boilers ignore vital context.

fact_check_explanation_title: Reported study doesn’t talk about Alzheimer’s
fact_check_explanation_summary: It was research into the impact of dietary intake of flavonoids on subjective cognitive decline.

fact_check_explanation_title: Abortion rate lower than claimed as miscarriages not factored in
fact_check_explanation_summary: ONS data claims one in four pregnancies end in abortion, but this doesn’t count pregnancies which end in miscarriage.

fact_check_explanation_title: Vaccine deaths are not higher than Covid-19 deaths
fact_check_explanation_summary: An article reproduced across a number of sites repeatedly draws misleading conclusions from official data.

fact_check_explanation_title: What are the rules on consent for Covid-19 vaccines for teens?
fact_check_explanation_summary: People aged 16 or over can consent to their own medical treatment.

fact_check_explanation_title: NHS Test and Trace cost £13.5 billion in its first year
fact_check_explanation_summary: £37 billion is its two year budget, but it only spent £13.5 billion in its first year, which is less than expected.

fact_check_explanation_title: Yellow Card data isn't proof of Covid-19 vaccine deaths
fact_check_explanation_summary: This system provides a way of reporting and monitoring suspected reactions.

fact_check_explanation_title: There is no graphene oxide in the Covid-19 vaccines
fact_check_explanation_summary: The nanoparticles used in some of the vaccines are lipid nanoparticles. They are not made of graphene oxide.

fact_check_explanation_title: Australian government hasn’t admitted vaccines are a dangerous poison
fact_check_explanation_summary: Medicines are generally referred to as poisons in Western Australian legislation.
